select m.* from menu m
,category c where m.category_id = c.category_id and m.category_id = #{category_id}
where 1=1
and m.menu_del = 'N'
select m.* from menu m join menu_type mt on m.menu_id = mt.menu_id join type t on t.type_id = mt.type_id where mt.type_id in (${typeIdStr}) and m.menu_del = 'N' and m.category_id = #{category_id}
